content.raw:
In general xml attributes are very bad for these reasons:
   attributes cannot contain multiple values (child elements can)
   attributes are not easily expandable (for future changes)
   attributes cannot describe structures (child elements can)
   attributes are more difficult to manipulate by program code
   attribute values are not easy to test against a DTD

So we are moving away from using them.
content.html:
In general xml attributes are very bad for these reasons: attributes cannot contain multiple values (child elements can) attributes are not easily expandable (for future changes) attributes cannot describe structures (child elements can) attributes are more difficult to manipulate by program code attribute values are not easy to test against a DTD

So we are moving away from using them.
